 Promotion for New Postpaid Subscribers in 11/2013 1. Eligible subscribers: New activated post paid. Postpaid subscribers which are blocked incoming and outgoing calls before 30/09 /2013 and are in the keeping subscriber time or deleted but haven't re-used yet, re-use and don’t join any Activated Promotion. Notes: in case of being block 2 ways communication by being in debt, customer must pay all debt. NOT applicable for: Professional, assigned, tested subscribers, internal customer’s subscribers 2. Benefits: Select 1 in 2 following promotion plan when activation Regulation KN69 KN149 Activation Fee New postpaid: VND 60.000 including activation fee (VND 35.000) + sim fee (VND 25.000) Monthly subscription fee VND 49.000 Joining Fee / Period VND 69.000 VND 149.000 Free on-net call plan / Period Unlimit free minutes per call, maximum 700 minutes / period Application scope On-net call MF Fixed VNPT number in all over the country . On-net call MF Vinaphone Fixed VNPT number in all over the country . Time for getting benefits until 30/4/2015 (including the time being block 2 ways communication and stop using service temporarily Commit to using at least 12 cycles Cancel HUY_KN send to 999, If customers cancel the promotion, they are not allowed to re-register 3. Regulation: Must commit to paying all fees: joining fee, monthly fee, incurred fee as current regulations Do not allow to end contract before the commit time (12 cycles) If canceling before ending billing cycle, customer must pay joining fee as using days and customer still can get 700 free minutes If canceling the promotion, the promotion plan will be canceled immediately since canceling successfully. Switch to other subscriber types Cancel/Stop using postpaid. Transferring ownership. Cancel joining promotion . VAT included. Cannot upgrade plans Applied for current rounding rule Applied for peak and off-peak hour All benefits are applied for 1 cycle only Do not allow joining other promotions. If subscriber can join other promotions (as regulations), subscriber will enjoy the promotion which has highest benefit and follow regulation of that promotion. 4 . Time of promotion : From 1/11/2013 to 30/11/2013 2013&#24180;11&#26376; &#21518;&#20184;&#36153;&#21495;&#30721;&#20837;&#32593;&#20248;&#24800;&#27963;&#21160; 1. &#23545;&#35937; &#65306; &#38480;&#20110;&#20010;&#20154;&#21518;&#20184;&#36153;&#23458;&#25143;&#65306; &#21033;&#29992; &#12377;&#12427; &#12290; &#12356;&#12388;&#12391;&#12418;&#12424;&#12356;&#12290; &#20351;&#12356;&#20999;&#12425;&#12394;&#12356;&#22580;&#21512;&#12399;&#27425;&#12398;&#35506;&#37329;&#12469;&#12452;&#12463;&#12523;&#12395;&#21033;&#29992;&#12391;&#12365;&#12394;&#12356; &#47308; , &#48156;&#49373;&#54624; &#51204;&#54868;&#50836;&#44552; &#46321; &#48708;&#50857;&#51012; &#51648;&#48520;&#54624; &#44163;&#51012; &#49436;&#50557;&#54644; &#50556; &#54620;&#45796;. &#49436;&#50557;&#44592;&#44036;&#51204;&#50640; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47484; &#54644;&#52404;&#54616;&#47732; &#50504; &#46108;&#45796; . &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51008; &#44221;&#50864;&#45716; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#52712;&#49548;&#54624; &#46412;&#45716; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51648; &#47803; &#54616;&#44256; &#48708;&#50857;&#51060; &#49892;&#51228; &#49324;&#50857;&#54620; &#51068;&#49688;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#48512;&#44284;&#46104;&#47728; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#47924;&#47308; &#53685;&#54868;&#47484; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#54624; &#44163;&#51012; &#52712;&#49548;&#54616;&#47732; &#49457;&#44277;&#51201;&#51004;&#47196; &#52712;&#49548;&#54624; &#49884;&#44036;&#48512;&#53552; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#50630;&#45796; : &#49440; / &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47196; &#51204;&#54872; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49325;&#51228; &#44228;&#50557;&#51088; &#48320;&#44221; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#44144;&#51208; / &#52712;&#49548; &#54056;&#53556; &#50629;&#44536;&#47112;&#51060;&#46300; &#48520;&#44032;&#45733;&#54632; &#54788;&#54665; &#50732;&#47548;&#52376;&#47532;&#48277;&#50640; &#51201;&#50857;&#51060; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . &#50836;&#44552;&#51032; &#44592;&#51456;&#51008; (Pick time) &#54588;&#53356;&#53440;&#51076; ( &#48148;&#49244; &#49884;&#44036; ) &#44536;&#47532;&#44256; (Off pick time) &#48148;&#49240;&#51648; &#50506;&#51008; &#49884;&#44036;&#45824;&#50640;&#45716; &#45796; &#51201;&#50857;&#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . &#54812;&#53469;&#51060; &#54620; &#51452;&#44592;&#50640;&#47564; &#51201;&#50857;&#46108;&#45796; &#44256;&#44061;&#51060; &#50948; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50752; &#45796;&#47480; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#46041;&#49884; &#52280;&#50668;&#54616;&#47732; &#50504; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; ( &#45796;&#47480; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#53945;&#48324;&#54620; &#44508;&#51221;&#51060; ( &#45796;&#47480; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#44032;&#45733;&#54620; &#45236;&#50857; ) &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . &#44256;&#44061;&#51060; &#50948; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50752; &#45796;&#47480; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#46041;&#49884; &#52280;&#50668;&#54616;&#47732; &#44032;&#51109; &#53360; &#49436;&#48708;&#49828; &#51080;&#45716; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#50864;&#45824;&#47484; &#48155;&#51012; &#44163;&#51077;&#45768;&#45796; ( &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#45796;&#47493;&#45768;&#45796; ) 3. &#51060;&#48292;&#53944; &#44592;&#44036; : 2013 &#45380; 1 1 &#50900; 0 1 &#51068; &#48512;&#53552; 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 30 &#51068; &#44620;&#51648; &#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6038;&#6096;&#6035;&#6098;&#6034;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;&#6035;&#6085;&#6017;&#6082; 11/2013 1. &#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035;&#6063;&#6016;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6023;&#6035;&#6026;&#6076;&#6021;&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6040;&#6102; 2&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6040;&#6075;&#6035;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 30/09/2013 &#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6042;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6042;&#6074; VAT&#6100;​ &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6034;&#6042;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6100;​ &#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6043;&#6078;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6035;&#6085;&#6040;&#6089;&#6084;&#6020;&#6042;&#6044;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6040;&#6089;&#6084;&#6020;&#6033;&#6086;&#6035;&#6081;&#6042;&#6100;​ &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6050;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6031;&#6082;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020; &#6036;&#6078;&#6047;&#6071;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6081;&#6020;(&#6043;&#6071;&#6017;&#6071;&#6031;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;), &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031; &#6021;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 01/11/2013 &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 30/11/2013 &#6100;​
